Articles.Content:
Some kind of button(s) on a flag's click menu perhaps? I've searched, and the only thing I've found was this post, which details the "take down the flag and orient your kerbal correctly" workaround.

Well, after you've done with 0.23 perhaps. I'm wondering what happens if you dump a science bay with a bunch of docking ports and dockable rovers near some biome borders meself. Can't wait!

I would be quite happy if my Kerbal just planted the flag where he's standing an in the direction he is facing when I tell him to do so. No rotating necessary after that. That feature of always planting the flag in N/S direction is not appreciated.
